scripts.all: jlpm run clean && jlpm run build && jlpm run build:jupyter
scripts.all:watch: jlpm run clean && jlpm run build && jlpm run build:jupyter:watch
scripts.build:dev: jlpm install && jlpm run clean:packages && lerna link && jlpm run build:packages && jlpm run link:packages && jupyter labextension list
scripts.build:jupyter: (jupyter lab build || (jlpm run build:jupyter:remediate && jupyter lab build)) && jupyter lab
scripts.build:jupyter:remediate: curr_dir=$PWD && (cd $(jupyter lab path | head -n1 | sed s/Application\ directory:\ *//)/staging && echo $PWD && echo '"@jupyterlab:registry" "http://localhost:4873"' >> .yarnrc && cat .yarnrc && YARN_REGISTRY=http://localhost:4873 node ./yarn.js install --non-interactive && cd $curr_dir) || cd $curr_dir
scripts.build:jupyter:watch: (jupyter lab build || (jlpm run build:jupyter:remediate && jupyter lab build)) && jupyter lab --watch
scripts.clean: jlpm run clean:jupyter && jlpm clean:packages && jlpm clean:node
scripts.clean:jupyter: jlpm run uninstall:extensions && (lerna run --no-bail unlink || echo 'At least one unlink command failed, but continuing...') && jupyter lab clean
scripts.lint: jlpm run lint:css && jlpm run lint:typescript
scripts.lint:check: jlpm run prettier:check && jlpm run lint:css:check && jlpm run lint:typescript:check
scripts.rebuild:packages: jlpm run clean:packages && jlpm run build:packages
scripts.registry:init: jlpm run registry:adduser && jlpm run registry:register
